name: Tomio's Early Works in Game Maker Studio
name_original: Tomio's Early Works in Game Maker Studio
description:
This is a collection of all my games from 2015. They're all programmed in Game Maker Studio and run on Windows 10. 

They started as student projects for a game design class, but I fleshed most of these out to play like a simple arcade game.* Each game started as an experiment to explore a particular concept or mechanic.

*(RPS_Tomio is actually an unfinished proof-of-concept prototype that is the core of a VR game I'm releasing in the near future. The rest of the games are games.)
